original_title: Professor Norman Cornett: 'Since when do we divorce the right answer from an honest answer?'
overview: This feature documentary by Alanis Obomsawin is a thoughtful tribute to Norman Cornett, a McGill University professor celebrated by scores of students appreciative of his unconventional yet powerful teaching methods who was controversially dismissed from his teaching duties in 2007.
title: Professor Norman Cornett: 'Since when do we divorce the right answer from an honest answer?'
